code:
Dear [Recipient Name],

We wanted to take this opportunity to inform you about a recent update that affects your account. As part of our ongoing efforts to enhance the security of our platform, we would like to kindly remind you that we have adjusted the way we process outgoing transactions.

[Adjustment Details]

As a result, all existing and new accounts will require your approval for any future transactions. Your card information remains the same, so you may continue to make purchases through your existing account.

This adjustment has been implemented for our safety and security measures, ensuring that you receive all the benefits of our platform without any cyber-security breaches.

To avoid any inconvenience or confusion, we kindly ask that all transactions be processed through our existing account. If you have any queries or would like to know more, please feel free to contact our technical support team.

Thank
